line_1: Whilst He alone my real Fav'rite rises,
line_2: Who every Thing to its just Value prizes,

line_1: Whilst He alone my real Fav'rite rises,
line_2: And neither courts, nor yet my Gifts despises.

line_1: When from old Ocean Venus rises.
line_2: Rule every heart that virtue prizes,

line_1: Quoth he (and on his Crupper rises)
line_2: But that once known, then less suffices.

line_1: On thy firm arch the structure rises.
